metadata.description: Prosecutor Chiyuki Amamiya, who works at the western branch of the Tokyo district prosecutor's office, can't seem to choose between two men. One of them is his junior Yoshitaka Morooka, who used to help the family company, while the other is the former elite home office prince who fell from grace, Masachika Katori. Amamiya finds himself torn between the earnestness of Morooka and the mystery surrounding Katori. What fate awaits these men? Find out in this sequel to the popular title, Pride. --------------Translated by Anna Haverinen; Edited by Sora; Lettered by Devyn Chen
metadata.name: Pride : A Deceitful Man
